歡迎來到這款會助您一勞永逸地說不煙草，戒掉煙的應用程式。這是為那些希望戒煙的人設計的空間。

需要幫助戒煙嗎？想戒掉香煙嗎？希望對煙草說不嗎？如果您決心戒煙，Cig'Arrête在此幫助您戒掉香煙。

一起，我們都可以戒煙，共同對煙草和香煙說不。與其他所有想要戒煙，共同對煙草和香煙說不的人交流。這款戒煙應用程式是您戒掉香煙，對煙草說不的盟友。

Cig’Arrête應用程式是您戒煙的最佳支持者。當您決定戒掉香煙並對煙草說不時，您會發現許多的改善。從第一天開始，跟隨您的煙癮戒斷，並在接下來的十年內持續，以便最終戒煙，對煙草說不。

我們設計了特定的計劃來幫助您戒煙：

- 通過我們的30天冥想計劃，安心地戒煙，

- 在戒煙期間，通過我們的睡眠分析和支持模塊保護您的睡眠。

Cig’Arrête應用程式提供了許多幫助您戒煙，終於對煙草說不的建議。您將找到激勵您戒掉香煙和提高戒煙動力的鼓舞人心的語錄。

我們提供了一個香煙和節省計數器，以激勵您戒掉香煙。

Cig'Arrête幫助您迎接戒煙，戒掉香煙和對抗煙草的挑戰。與一個偉大的社區分享您的進展，大家都團結在同一個目標中：戒煙，戒掉香煙並對煙草說不。

每天，每週或每月，保持您戒煙，戒掉香煙並對煙草說不的力量和勇氣。我們的應用程式在此幫助您戒斷煙癮，提供永久戒掉香煙的建議。

根據您的需求調整我們的應用程式，以幫助您戒煙，戒掉香煙並對煙草說不。您的應用程式是您過上無煙生活的良伴。

Cig'Arrête，這款幫助您戒煙，對煙草說不的應用程式只等您。加入一個不可思議的社區，互相幫助以永久戒煙。

應用描述:
管理您的健康並做出正確的生活方式選擇可能會變得重複、令人困惑，甚至帶來壓力。

Elfie 是與健康的成年人、慢性病患者、營養師、醫生、研究人員和生活方式教練共同開發的，是世界上第一個為您追踪生命體徵和症狀、並做出正確生活方式選擇的應用程式，並對此進行獎勵。

主要功能特點

Elfie應用程式是一個具有以下功能的健康應用程式：

生活方式管理：
1. 體重管理
2. 戒菸
3. 步數追蹤
4. 卡路里燃燒和身體活動（*）
5. 睡眠管理（*）
6. 女性健康（*）

數位藥盒：
1. 超過4百萬種藥物
2. 用藥提醒和補充提醒
3. 依治療領域的遵從性統計資料

生命體徵監測、趨勢和指南：
1. 血壓
2. 血糖和HbA1c
3. 膽固醇水平（HDL-C、LDL-C、三酸甘油脂）
4. 心絞痛（胸痛）
5. 心臟衰竭（*）
6. 症狀（*）

遊戲化

機制：
1. 每位用戶都會得到一個根據其生活方式目標和疾病（如果有的話）調整的個性化自我管理計劃。
2. 每次您添加一個生命體徵、遵循您的計劃，甚至閱讀文章或回答測驗，您都將獲得Elfie幣。
3. 憑藉這些幣，您可以獲得令人驚奇的獎品（高達$2000甚至更多），或者捐贈給慈善機構。

道德：
1. 無論健康與否：每位用戶，無論健康與否，都可以通過完成其計劃每月獲得相同數量的幣。
2. 服藥與否：正在服藥的用戶不會因此而獲得更多的幣，我們也不鼓勵任何類型的藥物使用。如果您正在服藥，我們將平等地因為您對自己誠實而獎勵您：服藥或跳過藥物將使您獲得相同數量的幣。
3， 好時光和壞時光：您將因紀錄良好的生命體徵或不良的生命體徵而獲得相同數量的幣。重要的是您保持對健康的監測和管理。

數據保護和隱私保護

在Elfie，我們非常重視數據保護和您的隱私。因此，無論您所在的國家是哪個，我們都決定實施來自歐盟（GDPR）、美國（HIPAA）、新加坡（PDPA）、巴西（LGPD）和土耳其（KVKK）的最嚴格政策。我們任命了一位獨立的數據隱私專家和多名數據代表來監督我們的行動並保護您的權利。

醫學和科學的信譽

Elfie內容由醫生、營養師、研究人員審查，並獲得六個醫學協會的認可。

無行銷

我們不銷售任何產品或服務。我們也不允許廣告。Elfie的財務支持來自僱主、保險公司、實驗室、醫院，以降低私人和公共醫療系統的慢性疾病成本。

免責聲明

Elfie旨在成為一個健康應用程式，旨在鼓勵用戶追蹤與其健康相關的指標並獲得健康生活方式的一般資訊。它不打算用於醫療目的，特別是預防、診斷、管理或監測疾病。請參閱使用條款以獲取更多詳細資訊。

如果您感覺不適，出現與藥物有關的副作用，或者尋求醫療建議，請聯繫您的醫生，因為Elfie不是這樣做的正確平台。

祝您健康。

Elfie 團隊

（*）自 2024 年 8 月起提供

應用描述:
使用 iOS 版全新 My Last Cigarette™（原創戒菸軟件）戒菸並保持戒菸狀態。 自 1999 年以來，My Last Cigarette 已成功幫助數千名戒菸者戒菸。 如果您真的想戒菸，那麼這個應用程序可以讓一切變得不同！

我最後一支香煙成功了！

只需輸入您的吸煙習慣和個人詳細信息，然後觀察各種指標顯示您的預期壽命延長、循環和肺功能改善、儲蓄等等。 超過 10 種不同的讀數讓您了解情況並保持動力。 iOS 版《我的最後一根香煙》是一款經過驗證的輔助工具，可以幫助您抵制重新開始這種致命的煙癮。 這是一個重要的工具，受益於多年對吸煙有害影響的醫學研究。 通過向您展示您健康的幕後改善，您的意志力將會增強，您的決心從第一天起就會增強。 請務必查看推薦。


特徵

統計數據每秒實時更新！
尼古丁含量讀數
預期渴望讀數
所有計算均基於最新的醫學知識和統計數據。
每日勵志名言或醫學事實。
每日圖片/圖表。
每日勵志訊息
您血液中的一氧化碳水平
預期壽命讀數增加
您成為非吸煙者的時間讀數
未吸香煙數量讀數
您心髒病發作的風險與之前的風險相比
您患肺癌的風險與之前的風險相比
省錢
預期循環改善
預期肺功能改善
自從你退出讀出以來的死亡人數
讀數每秒更新一次，並且基於您個人過去的吸煙習慣。
專為 iPhone、iPad 和 iPod Touch 設計的通用應用程序。 無需購買兩次。


概括

我的最後一支香煙已幫助數千名使用者成功抵制重新吸煙。 如果您真的想戒菸，那麼“我最後一支煙”可能會帶來改變。


真實的主動推薦

“我曾多次嘗試吸煙，但從未堅持下來。我購買了這個程序，並且非常驚訝地發現，能夠直觀地看到自己的進步確實有助於保持戒菸的動力。我已經90 天沒有抽煙了，實際上完全沒有吸煙的慾望。我認為這個程序是幫助你戒菸的好工具。”

“它不會為你做所有艱苦的工作，但當你開始渴望時，它可以給你很大的幫助。只要看一下圖表，想像一下必須回到第一個地方。自4 月19 日以來，我就沒再抽煙了2002 年，在吸煙二十年後。”

“它確實幫助我個人直觀地了解了我體內發生的情況，所有其他信息都增強了我的決心。自從我拿到香煙以來，我就沒有再拿起過一支煙。”

“不知道是因為我的抄送應用程序收費還是什麼，但自從我購買它以來我就沒有吸煙了，這對以圖形方式了解您的健康狀況有很大幫助。酷！”

“我吸煙了 40 年，直到我找到最後一支煙
過去 40 年來，我嘗試過各種方法來戒菸。 從我 11 歲開始，現在 52 歲。我現在覺得我可以說我是一個不吸煙者。 一切都取決於“我的最後一支煙” 每天早上我都會打開 PDA 看看我還沒有抽多少支煙。 這讓我又迎來了沒有人的一天。 如果這個政府真的想減少吸煙者的數量，就應該使用這個軟件並免費提供給國民健康。 我一生中已經吸過 433590 支香煙，但更重要的是，自從今年 7 月 27 日戒菸以來，我沒有再吸過 4043 支。 買這個軟件幫自己一個忙。”

評論.標題: Great visual way to keep motivated
評論.內容: Excellent app!

評論.標題: Great reminder until it just stopped working
評論.內容: This app was a fantastic reminder that I loved going to and looking at how much time had elapsed, how many cigarettes I have not smoked, how much healthier my lungs should be. But now all of a sudden the app won’t even open. Please fix it!

Really helped seeing my progress and gave me something to look forward to. I smoked for 30 years and 3 packs a day for 20 years and I’ve been smoke free for 2 years now. The app doesn’t make you quit but helps when you see your progress.
Good
It’s free and exactly what you need all in one.

評論.標題: I wish it would broaden a bit
評論.內容: The stats are great, but I wish it was more interactive.  For example, other apps will allow you to put in your upcoming quit date so you can build your network, plan, and prepare.  This app will not allow you to do this. I wish it would use the awesome and empowering stats and graphics to empower you leading up to quoting. Not just after.
I have quit six times before this. I want this to be my last time. App helps me to not pick up a cigarette since I quit.

評論.標題: Is there an app that helps you step down?
評論.內容: Only use if you’ve already quit or plan to quit cold turkey.    Does not let you put in a future quit date and help you quit over time.  I plan to slow my smoking down over 2 weeks.  This app might be good after that.
I couldn’t enter anything into the app
It’s been 1 1/2 years since my last cigarette and I still check the app to see how much has changed and how much money I’ve saved.  Was very helpful when I just started quitting.

評論.標題: Love the app but have some issues
評論.內容: I love that it tracks everything but I was under the impression that I could change the date of when I had my last cigarette but I am unable to do that.
No intrusion, simply open the app and lots of data about the effects of quitting since your quit day. Visit it often to affirm choice to quit or when cravings get strong. Great tool.
This app is awesome!! I love that I can keep track of my statistics.
Just started and already asking for a review.  Hard to rate after 1 day!
It wouldn't let me put my quit date after the current date. Scrolling dates feature seem to be broken.

I’m surely saving more than a dollar a day not smoking
But I do like the app other than that
So far I love it

but I love how it tells you a lot more than just how much money you have saved and how many cigarettes you have missed out on.

I have been smoking for 30 years and have now not smoked for 30 days. I don’t think the app is the magic bullet that made it happen but it has certainly helped. There is a lot of positive support but the negative reminders are most effective. The daily pictures can scare the hell out of you. I don’t want to be the content of a “picture of the day” because I smoked myself to an early death! Don’t let your brain fool you into cheating the system while you are cutting back. That has always been my failing point, especially when I get down to just a few butts a day. This tim I just said to hell with it and quit altogether a few days before my planned quit date. Good luck everyone, I hope we can all beat this!!! 😀

I like this app for than others

應用描述:
抽煙有數方能戒煙有術，成為香煙掌控者，而不是成為心理煙癮的奴隸！

眾所周知，戒煙最難的是克服心理煙癮，本App致力於解決抽煙者心理煙癮。通過打卡、模擬、動效等方式，讓用戶完成對心理煙癮的克服，有效地降低戒煙者心理煙癮對戒煙進度的影響，同時也能大大降低復吸率。

心理煙癮，也稱為心理依賴，是指吸煙者在心理層面上對吸煙產生的強烈渴望和依賴感。與身體對尼古丁的依賴不同，心理煙癮更多是與情緒、習慣和心理狀態相關的依賴。它通常表現為吸煙者在某些情境或情緒下（如壓力大、焦慮、無聊或社交場合）產生強烈的吸煙慾望，即便身體上並不真正需要尼古丁。

心理煙癮的特點包括：

	1.	習慣性觸發：吸煙往往與日常習慣緊密相關。例如，吸煙者在喝咖啡、開車或與朋友聚會時會不自覺地想要吸煙。
	2.	情緒依賴：吸煙常常被視為應對壓力、焦慮或情緒低落的一種方法。吸煙者可能認為吸煙能帶來放鬆或幫助集中注意力。
	3.	社會因素：社交場合中的吸煙行為容易形成習慣，吸煙者在與其他吸煙者交往時，會更強烈地感受到吸煙的需求。
	4.	儀式感：點燃香煙、吸煙的動作本身可能成為一種讓吸煙者感到舒適或習慣性的行為。

心理煙癮比身體煙癮更難戒除，因為它往往涉及長期的行為模式和情緒依賴，戒煙不僅需要身體上的戒斷，還需要應對心理和情感上的挑戰。

催眠状态是个人活动和心里决策的一种方式。21世纪初数字技术应用到了心理学中,被称为“自动催眠会议”。相比传统的方式,催眠会议能够利用更多的方式改变人的知觉。 

Hypnomatic — 催眠会议的程序

在“学科” 章节中包括了基于某种现象对催眠的原理的解读,大脑共振的频率,次声信息、有色噪音。

催眠会议—是一个包含视频(按特定频率旋转和脉冲的螺线或特定颜色额圆圈)的和音频的程序,通过将两种介质结合根据所选的会议主题作用于潜意识。由于同时使用潜意识暗示和神经性刺激,催眠会议能够使人身心放松,走出情感壁垒。

除了个性特征以外所有的人都有普通心理机制 (先天反射,基本本能,频率响应)。催眠会议就跟他们工作。以前精神分析学家花了数月和数年,但是现在几个星期来可以达到很多。你可以得到专业催眠治疗师帮忙在家里在舒适的环境。

注意!要按照规范说明使用催眠会议,如果违反相关的使用频率可会产生不良效果。可以几个程序同时使用。另外,对于受到酒精或催眠药物影响的人以及有妄想症、精神分裂症、精神病、癫痫、心律失常的人我们不建议使用催眠会议程序。

您需要理解的是,催眠会议不是利用神奇的魔法进行治疗,而是具体的针对使用者的某些方面进行治疗。催眠医师或催眠会议仅仅能够减轻其精神压力,而且治疗的效果还要取决于个人的决心和意志力。

愿望

無煙文化是香港社會的大趨勢，市民對戒煙服務的需求亦愈見增加。衞生署控煙酒辦公室特此推出「戒煙達人」應用程式幫助吸煙者戒煙。

吸煙者—你可於此應用程式評估你對尼古丁的依賴程度、訂下戒煙計劃及記下你的戒煙進度。此外，你亦可以瀏覽應用程式內提供的戒煙資訊及貼士，以協助你遠離煙草。

非吸煙者—你可推介家人和朋友使用此應用程式，藉此鼓勵他們戒煙！

透過APP讓戒菸變得更容易！以真實的數據、戒菸月曆一路陪伴您，APP並可連結各種戒菸資訊；讓戒菸輕鬆又愉快。
(一)省錢大作戰這部分的數據是經由一開始使用者填寫的基本資料計算而來，數字會隨著戒菸天數而增加，讓使用者了解自己目前戒菸的進度。
(二)戒菸四周提醒曆：28天的戒菸提醒文字訊息，28則訊息中會依照戒菸天數的不同而有不同的鼓勵文字，一開始系統自動設定為中午推播，使用者之後也可設定每日固定幾點跳出推播提醒的提示功能。
(三)菸害事實：菸害相關介紹文字與圖片
(四)戒菸迷思：說明戒菸迷思的文字
(五)戒菸四招：說明戒菸四招如何做
(六)戒菸門診：此功能讓使用者查詢離自己最近的戒菸門診，直接透過APP查看門診的地圖，或即刻撥打電話至門診掛號。

本活動抽獎活動與獎金提供皆與美商蘋果公司無關

評論.內容: I enjoy this app as I do not have to worry about how long it’s been since I quit. The app records it for me. Along with other stats. I’m glad I found it.
Just enough encouragement to keep me going watching my days go up.

評論.標題: 字体颜色是故意不让用户看清字的吗？
評論.內容: 如题，黑色的背景，黑色字体？你让我看啥？要看清还得眼睛凑到屏幕里看，这点基本的东西先弄清楚吧。

I had the free version that I downloaded almost 5 years ago when I quit. When I logged in today it told me to get the paid one to unlock all the features. I paid my .99 and downloaded the new app just to find it doesn’t work. I quit 4 years 242 days ago. When I put in the dates it doesn’t show the 4 years. It says I quit 242 days ago. I hit the help button which popped up an email message. I filled in my issues but then there is no send button to submit the issues. 
It was a really cool app until they went and messed it up.

I purchased this app in the past for a one time amount that was for uninterrupted, ongoing access. I used it for a while and benefited from the app, which I found to be informative and well put together. There was no option for subscription at that time, just purchase. After a few years, it stopped being updated and no longer worked properly. I attempted reinstalling to no avail. Now, when checking for my last cigarette date, I am requested to subscribe. Any past date or info is lost.
This site has been very helpful for me to follow my progress stopping smoking and not ever starting back.
Great app. SavedMyLife
I can see everything that they’re going for however the interface is just so poor and the time tracker for how long I haven’t smoked is so inaccurate

My daughter showed me this app and I was floored. Just looking at the savings was like a big slap in the face. I quit 8 days ago and have already saved so much money. The physical addiction is gone so now to find new habits to replace the normal times I would smoke is what I’m working on. I also like that it shows you your heart and lung health. This is a great app and keeps me motivated to not start back up!

I downloaded this app several years ago and I  found  it extremely helpful to (finally!) stop smoking. My old app doesn’t work anymore (even said it was no longer available in the App Store) so I went looking for it and DID find it; when I downloaded it I hoped it would import my data but that’s not the case. Is there any way to recover the data I had accumulated in an older version?
I love watching my stats go down. It’s a great visual for your long time goal.
An Android app is needed and only apple is available...

評論.標題: A huge part to me quitting
評論.內容:
I quit smoking 4 years and 101 days ago. I haven’t smoked over 31 THOUSAND cigarettes, and I have saved $11,714.45 by not smoking. 

This app was a HUGE part in helping me quit smoking. Anytime I had a craving, I would pull my phone out and look at my hot-streak. 

Quitting smoking is really, really hard. This app doesn’t make it easy, but it if helps you keep your resolve - like it did for me - then it’s completely worth it. I wholeheartedly recommend it.

I quit and now I 6 years 273 days.  Saved $12,811.25, not smoked 49,274.

I have enjoyed watching the date and money saved over the years.

My mom just quit 2 months ago, she now calls me and gives me her cigarette stats. 

I recommend
Very simplistic but provides interesting data that makes it fun to see how long you have gone without smoking.
Can’t change the date so it has accurate information. Frustrating.
You’re app is from the dark ages I want my money back

It’s really helped me stay quit. I haven’t smoked or vaped in 54 days as of this review. I still have cravings but when I do, I just look at my progress on this app and I’m able to get through them without smoking or vaping.

Paid the 99¢ for the ad free version. The app is simple and underwhelming. Gives me exactly the info I want, nothing more. No subscriptions or annoying notifications. So far I’m smoke free for 39 hours and have not smoked 30 cigs and saved $16.

應用描述:
NoPuff’s personalized dashboard shows you your Smoke-free time, money saved, health restored, nicotine avoided, cigarettes & vapes avoided, puff count, time saved, etc! Whether you want to save money, have stronger lungs, or live a quality life, NoPuff has your back!

Besides using NoPuff as a Quit smoking tracker, you can also use it to talk with other Quitters in the NoPuff community. A lot of people who use our app end up talking to other quitters to beat their cravings! That said, you can also take deep breathing sessions to avoid your moderate cravings!

Key Features:

‣ Overall Progress: Monitor your progress in real-time. Detailed stats about money saved, nicotine avoided, health improvements, and puffs avoided, all in real-time; you can also see a summary version of your improvements.

‣ Daily Check-ins: Did you have a smoke-free day? Great! Check in daily to create a streak that keeps you motivated for the future. 

‣ Cravings Tracker: You can also track your cravings throughout the day and the triggers that led to the craving. This can help you understand your triggers better and fight them.

‣ Community Support: NoPuff has its own safe space where you can connect with other quitters who can help you during your cravings. You can also be a motivator who saves other’s lives as you support them in their journey.

‣ Achievement Badges: Receive badges for your health, consistency, and support that you can easily share across your social media to boost your confidence and motivate you towards the right path.

‣ Quit Simulator: Quitting can be challenging, so we have realistic simulations to ease the process further. Suppose you have a craving; try our various simulations to avoid smoking or vaping.

‣ Breathing Exercise: Take control of your mind and strengthen your lungs with your breath exercise. Do it whenever you have time. Even a 1 min. exercise can begin the healing process.

Deciding to Quit smoking and vaping is a tough decision and also the best decision you can make for yourself and also for the people around you. Take the first step now. It may take some time to quit, but you can do it!

What are you waiting for? Install NoPuff and Quit Smoking for REAL!

They had a promotion for a lifetime subscription for free and every time I tried to sign up with that promotion it never took. A couple of days later the promotion was gone. 

I think they did something to block their own promotion so you were forced to buy a subscription.

UPDATE:  After much digging, I found out where to go. Still, you have lifetime default to
Charge. 

You no have an opinion that says sale. Stupid part is, you have $0.00 crossed out, and $14.99 next to it. 

Do you really think people are this stupid?

This is 100% scam because you say it’s free, so people will select it thinking it won’t change them. 

BOOM! You STEAL $14.99 a month.
It’s guiding you on your nicotine free journey with positive uplifting messages! Give it a try! I’m doing it :)

This app has been a great motivation for me to keep going on my journey. It keeps track of the times, has an open community group to talk in, has a craving tracker and triggers so you can learn your habits. My favorite part is the health information; has the health benefits of quitting plotted out for 15 years!! And tracks when you hit each milestone. This has honestly been the best part for me, to stay motivated so I can see the next benefit! 

When I had a small issue with the clock tracking, I emailed them and the response was amazing!! Fast replies and genuine interest in my issue being fixed, as well as checking in to make sure that I am still on track with my goals even through the issue!! And they figured it out! 

Just all around awesome! 10/10 ⭐️⭐️⭐️

抽大麻会使你的血清素受体超负荷，并降低结识新朋友的动力。如果放任自流，这可能会破坏你的生活。不要让大麻成瘾让你受益匪浅。下载此免费应用，即可获得应得的帮助。
 
 
来看看我们戒烟的7大理由：
 
1.你会有一个清醒的头脑
 
对于许多终生吸食大麻的人来说，这是戒除大麻的首要原因。如果你发现自己在吸食大麻后忘记了简单的事情，脑子里有几个小时到几天处于迷雾之中，那么戒掉它可能是正确的选择。
 
2.雄心勃勃
 
许多前途光明的人报告说，大麻的使用摧毁了他们的野心。他们兴奋的时候会想出有趣的想法，但到了时候就没有动力去推动了。他们最终变得非常自满，无法充分发挥他们的潜力。
 
3.充满活力
 
随着年龄的增长，大麻开始在许多方面对你的身体造成损害。抽大麻来忘记平凡的任务可能是你开始吸食的原因，但过了一段时间，你的肺就会开始堵塞并且血液流动会变慢。
 
4.养成良好的饮食习惯
 
每个人都知道吸食大麻会加速你的新陈代谢，这反过来又会让你非常饥饿。这就是通常所说的“快餐“。不管你吃什么类型的食物，这都会对你的整体健康和消化道造成负面影响。
 
5.拥有干净的肺部
 
关于吸烟的负面影响，一直有相互矛盾的研究，但人们一致同意的是，你仍然在吸入烟雾。这样长期使用会导致肺气肿、癌症和其他严重的健康问题。
 
6.依法生活
 
你抽大麻的时间越长，你遇到法律麻烦的机会就越大。当然，日益增长的合法化趋势让我们在吸食大麻方面更加厚颜无耻，但在大多数州，持有大麻仍然是非法的，无论如何，这仍然是一项联邦犯罪。
 
7.人身安全
 
你的毒贩真的是你的朋友吗？他可能看起来是，但在他的供应链上的某个地方，有一些严重的非法活动正在进行。从事非法活动的人更有可能犯下你不想被卷入其中的暴力犯罪。

評論.內容: This app was seemingly designed to tap into the reward system if my insane membrane. Grateful for the creators and all the hard work behind the scenes. Thank you.

Obviously, the creator of this app is part of the prohibition society, because cannabis is not addictive at all. these fake reviews are obviously of right wing Christian fanatics that believe everything is a sin, but y’all need to realize Genesis 129

If you are reading this looking for a reason not to smoke, I'm begging you not to. After 10+ years of stonerdom, when trying to quit, I experienced dreadful hypnic sleep (jerking awake right before falling asleep, maddening). Alternating hot/cold sweats and severe irritability get old very quick, too. It is truly so awful when you see how dependent you are on it; at one point I hadn't slept for a week and started hallucinating -- but I got over it eventually. Before, I never believed in physical addiction with THC, because we're literally taught in school that the only side effects are cotton mouth and munchies... All lies. I wish I had this knowledge 10, 12 years ago after I took my first hit. I wish I had just developed the coping skills to live my life without having to lean on substance abuse. With weed in particular, it's so hard to admit when it's a problem, especially with how readily available it is these days and with all the misinformation about it not being addictive. Thanks for this app that is specific to my problem (you feel a little silly trying to use an app intended for heroin users and alcoholics for weed. Just hits different).
Keeps me on track

This app has everything I was looking for… it shows how much money & time you save by not smoking, as well as a constant timer or how long you’ve been weed-free.. I also really like the fact that it offers “distractions” (games, relaxing pictures, etc) & mantras. It also gives you a Panic Button that sends a text to a contact of your choosing which I think is super creative and helpful. 

It’s unfortunate that it has a Pro Version, but that’s most apps nowadays sadly
